'''Mythcon 39''' was the thirty-ninth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The Valkyrie and the Goddess: The Warrior Woman in Fantasy"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Marjorie J. Burns]] (scholar) and Sharon Newman (author)
